title: The Prince's Day Out
description: Once upon a time, in a faraway land, there was a blind prince who lived confined to his bedroom. Accompanied by his sister, he traveled to the most incredible places thanks to his imagination. Follow the Prince and the Princessâ€™s fantastic journey through a magic kingdom where seagulls transport cities and ships sail on pearl necklaces instead of waves. Twelve whimsical drawings illustrate the story.
author: Monica La Porta
